overview:
Nick Edwards is Vice President of Marketing and Product Management.

As the former Director of Product Management and Marketing at Cisco Systems, Edwards led the team responsible for the IronPort Email Security product line, cloud security services, intrusion prevention systems as well as technical publications and training. He arrived at Cisco via the acquisition of IronPort Systems, the most successful network security startup in the past decade, where he served as Product Manager for the industry leading Email Security Appliance from product launch to a $300 million dollar run-rate.

relationships.title: Vice President of Marketing and Product Management
